name: Napoli Pizza

ingredients.name: black olives, pitted and coarsely chopped

preparation: Place pizza crust on a crisper or a Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner.
Spoon Marinara Sauce over dough and spread to edges. Sprinkle with Parmesan, then olives. Add anchovies, if using, then sprinkle with Seasoning, Sea Salt, and Pepper.
Bake until edges are crispy and cheese has melted, 8 - 10 minutes.
